statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-4 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 4 , 4 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 4 , 2 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 4 , 16 \, x^{3} - 20 \, x^{2} + 14 \, x - 8 , 10 \, x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} - x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
